titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Morningside College women's basketball team for winning the 2009 National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA) Division II championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/31/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Morningside College Mustangs for winning the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics Division II women's basketball national championship.
